title: Is Self-Censorship Taking Over Universities?
sub_head: Students debate cancel culture and staying silent in college.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss self-censorship. Next week we’ll ask, “As gas prices rise and electrical prices soar, should we be turning to nuclear power? Is nuclear fission green?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before March 22. The best responses will be published that night.
